attributes.action: Create legislation that regulates the growing number of cash back websites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many thousands of people are now using the growing band number of cash back websites, there is currently no legislation to monitor these websites.  They offer cash back to customers who click through to an external website and cash can range from a few pennies to a hundreds of pounds.  When things go wrong as it often does, you lose the cash and have no claim against either website.

We the undersigned ask the Prime Minister to legislate these websites so that cash back promised is paid in the same way as other financial websites are governed.
